title: about yourself?
content: Hello, I am Akash M, a highly motivated full-stack developer with expertise in Python, JavaScript, ReactJS, Django, and Machine Learning. I recently completed my B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science from Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, with a CGPA of 8.162. I have worked on various projects, including ETL pipelines, machine learning tools (MLPRO), an AI-based scenery classifier, and an automated YouTube content creator using APIs and Task Scheduler. I am passionate about problem-solving, AI-driven applications, and web development. I enjoy working on innovative projects and collaborating with cross-functional teams. In addition to my technical skills, I hold certifications in Python and Data Analysis with Python. I am eager to apply my skills and contribute to impactful projects. You can connect with me on LinkedIn and check out my work on GitHub.

title: Education
content: I have a B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science from Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering (2021-2024) with a CGPA of 8.162. Additionally, I completed a Diploma in Mechanical Engineering from Central Polytechnic College (2018-2021) with a CGPA of 8.6, and my SSLC from Kendriya Vidyalaya Gill Nagar (2007-2017) with a CGPA of 7.6.

title: Skills
content: My technical skills include Python, MySQL, HTML/CSS, and JavaScript. I have experience working with frameworks such as Django and ReactJS.

title: Certifications
content: I have certifications in Python development (GUVI), Data Analysis with Python (FreeCodeCamp) and Artificial Intelligence for All (Infosys). You can verify my certifications here: https://www.guvi.in/verify-certificate?id=5s654x6LPtG505614F#, https://www.freecodecamp.org/certification/AKASH150421/data-analysis-with-python-v7 and https://drive.google.com/file/d/1C3le-YGHMknqLZodMf-04jky2hqi8Z_7/view

title: Projects
content:
I have worked on multiple projects, including:
1. **ETL** - A process for extracting, transforming, and loading data from various sources.
2. **MLPRO** - A machine learning tool for running ML algorithms and generating plots.
3. **Not a Hand Cricket** - A game played between a computer and a human.
4. **Scenery Classifier** - A CNN-based image classification model for classifying landscapes.
5. **YouTube Business** - An automated system that fetches videos from non-copyrighted sources, adds music, and uploads them to YouTube using an API and Task Scheduler.

title: Interests and Talents
content: My interests include drawing, sports, and story writing. I am also skilled in problem-solving and creative thinking.

title: Contact Information
content: You can contact me via email at akash150421@gmail.com or by phone at 7358508187. Connect with me on LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/akash-m-611333245 and GitHub: https://github.com/noobder.
